Question: Sigma Design CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sigma Design

Product: CES 2024

- Sigma Design will be part of the Washington State Department of Commerce delegation at CES 2024, showcasing their innovative products.
- The company will be located at Booth #55832 in the Venetian Expo, Halls A-D (upper floor).
- The products will include innovative engineering and design solutions for product development.
